task.title: Configure and expand Baseband Radio Node(s)

ul.li: The node type being expanded is a Baseband Radio Node.
You have Autoprovisioning_Operator role or higher.
Be familiar with Expand a Node Overview.
The node that is being expanded is synchronized with ENM.
The required Upgrade Package for the version of software installed on the node is available in SHM see Manage Software Packages.
Desktop CSV or XLSX editor software, for example Excel.

prereq.p: If a Health Check Profile is referenced as part of an Expansion Project a Health Check Profile must be created before Node Expansion, see Create Health Check Profile for eNodeB Baseband Radio Node Type. For more information on Health Check see Concepts, HealthCheck.
Additional NHC privileges are required to view the health check reports. See NHC Online Help for more information.

result.p: The Baseband Radio Node(s) automatic expansion has started.
